leads.lead_text: Spikes mostly spreading from main axis on short lateral branches, to c. 1 cm long; erect shrubs to c. 1 m high; inland areas only
Spikes mostly ascending to erect, to 5 cm long; flowers free from each other and from bract above; mostly spreading shrubs to c. 50 cm high; coasts and inland
